Detailed Description

This class represents a TinyJava (prefix or postfix) unary expression involving a unary operator and an operand expression.

A unary expression is represented by:

  • an operator (which must be an arithmetic operator)
  • information if it is a postfix unary expression
  • an operand Expression subtree representing the operator's argument

Create a new UnaryExpression object.

Parameters:
lno source code line number with the unary expression.
op an int value representing the operator; it should be one of the constants defined in the AstNode class
arg an Expression representing the operand
post a boolean value indicating if it is a postfix unary expression; the default is false
Exceptions:
AstException if either the arg operand is NULL
